flavor_text: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve it discards the bones it was wearing.
They tend to guard their posteriors with suitable bones they have found. They pursue weak Pokemon.
Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
